itemInfo.itemDesc: A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.\n- How to Obtain: It can be Produced at Forest of Seclusion, Castle Ruins, Bloody Monastery, Northern Plain of Serendia, and Mediah Northern Highlands. It can be also be obtained by Lumbering Maple Trees.

item.name: Shining Steel Lumbering Axe
item.desc: A Gathering Tool used to help cut wood efficiently.\n- Gathering Time: - 10 sec \n- Cannot be Repaired

item.name: Steel Lumbering Axe
item.desc: A Gathering Tool used to help cut wood efficiently.\n- Gathering Time: - 8 sec \n- Cannot be Repaired

item.desc: A Gathering Tool made for extracting ore and minerals from rock.\n- Gathering Time: - 8 sec \n- Cannot be Repaired

item.desc: A Gathering Tool used to collect hide from dead animals.\n- Gathering Time: - 10 sec \n- Cannot be Repaired

item.desc: A Gathering Tool used to collect hide from dead animals.\n- Gathering Time: - 8 sec \n- Cannot be Repaired

item.desc: A Gathering Tool used to collect meat from dead animals.\n- Gathering Time: - 10 sec \n- Cannot be Repaired

item.name: Steel Butcher Knife
item.desc: A Gathering Tool used to collect meat from dead animals.\n- Gathering Time: - 8 sec \n- Cannot be Repaired

item.name: Shining Steel Hoe
item.desc: A Gathering Tool used to harvest wild herbs and crops.\n- Gathering Time: - 10 sec \n- Cannot be Repaired

item.name: Steel Hoe
item.desc: A Gathering Tool used to harvest wild herbs and crops.\n- Gathering Time: - 8 sec \n- Cannot be Repaired

item.name: Maple Float
item.desc: A float made of maple wood. Good for catching rare fishes.\n\nCan be enhanced with Blackstone (Weapon).

item.name: Bares Staff
item.desc: A staff possessed with a hatred for all living things.

item.name: Maple Timber Crate
item.desc: A Trade Item containing 10 planks of Maple Timber.

item.name: Farm Wagon Flag
item.desc:
A flag for a four-wheeled wagon.

- Can be Installed on: Four-Wheeled Wagon

It can be enhanced with a Black Stone (Armor).

item.name: Strong Wagon Flag
item.desc:
A flag for a wagon.

- Can be Installed on: Wagon

It can be enhanced with a Black Stone (Armor).

item.name: Farm Wagon Wheel
item.desc:
A wheel for a four-wheeled wagon.

- Can be Installed on: Four-Wheeled Wagon

It can be enhanced with a Black Stone (Armor).

item.name: Strong Wagon Wheel
item.desc:
A wheel that can be installed on a wagon.

- Can be Installed on: Wagon

It can be enhanced with a Black Stone (Armor).

item.name: Shining Steel Pickaxe
item.desc: A Gathering Tool made for extracting ore and minerals from rock.\n- Gathering Time: - 10 sec \n- Cannot be Repaired

item.name: Bares Staff of Destruction
item.desc:
The energy of Destruction is contained within this Bares Staff.
It can be developed by Refining a common Bares Staff.

- Repair to Max. Durability: Bares Staff of Destruction, Bares Staff

item.name: Bares Staff of Crimson Flame
item.desc:
The energy of Crimson Flame is contained within this Bares Staff.
It can be developed by Refining a common Bares Staff.

- Repair to Max. Durability: Bares Staff of Crimson Flame, Bares Staff

item.name: Ultimate Kalis Staff
item.desc:
A Kalis staff at its maximum potential.
It has a low chance of being crafted when upgrading a Kalis staff.

- Restore Max Durability: Kalis Staff of Crimson Flame, Kalis Staff of Destruction, Kalis Staff of Temptation, Kalis Staff

item.name: Kalis Staff of Temptation
item.desc:
The energy of Temptation is contained within this Kalis Staff.
It can be developed by Refining a common Kalis Staff.

- Repair to Max. Durability: Kalis Staff of Temptation, Kalis Staff

item.name: Kalis Staff of Destruction
item.desc:
The energy of Destruction is contained within this Kalis Staff.
It can be developed by Refining a common Kalis Staff.

- Repair to Max. Durability: Kalis Staff of Destruction, Kalis Staff

item.name: Kalis Staff of Crimson Flame
item.desc:
The energy of Crimson Flame is contained within this Kalis Staff.
It can be developed by Refining a common Kalis Staff.

- Repair to Max. Durability: Kalis Staff of Crimson Flame, Kalis Staff

item.name: Ultimate Bares Staff
item.desc:
A Bares staff at its maximum potential.
It has a low chance of being crafted when upgrading a Bares staff.

- Restore Max Durability: Bares Staff of Crimson Flame, Bares Staff of Destruction, Bares Staff of Temptation, Bares Staff

item.name: Bares Staff of Temptation
item.desc:
The energy of Temptation is contained within this Bares Staff.
It can be developed by Refining a common Bares Staff.

- Repair to Max. Durability: Bares Staff of Temptation, Bares Staff

item.name: Kalis Staff
item.desc: A staff capable of reaching the highest potential of its kind.

item.name: Maple Plywood
item.desc:
A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.

- How to Obtain: It can be also be obtained by Chopping Maple Timber. It requires the knowledge of Chopping: Beginner.

※ Find Lebyos in Heidel and complete the Working the Ash Tree Quest to obtain related knowledge.

※ In order to perform the Quest for Beginner Processing knowledge, achieve Gathering Level 14 or higher and visit Ficy in Heidel to complete the corresponding Quest. Refer to the Black Spirit Guide (/key) for detailed information.

item.name: Demihuman Longbow
item.desc: A longbow made for fighting threats to Humankind.

item.name: Ultimate Demihuman Longbow
item.desc:
A Demihuman Longbow developed to its maximum potential.
There is a small chance this will be developed when Refining a common Demihuman Longbow.

- Repair to Max. Durability: Demihuman Longbow of Crimson Flame, Demihuman Longbow of Destruction, Demihuman Longbow of Temptation, Demihuman Longbow

item.name: Demihuman Longbow of Temptation
item.desc:
The energy of Temptation is contained within this Demihuman Longbow.
It can be developed by Refining a common Demihuman Longbow.

- Repair to Max. Durability: Demihuman Longbow of Temptation, Demihuman Longbow

item.name: Demihuman Longbow of Destruction
item.desc:
The energy of Destruction is contained within this Demihuman Longbow.
It can be developed by Refining a common Demihuman Longbow.

- Repair to Max. Durability: Demihuman Longbow of Destruction, Demihuman Longbow

item.name: Demihuman Longbow of Crimson Flame
item.desc:
The energy of Crimson Flame is contained within this Demihuman Longbow.
It can be developed by Refining a common Demihuman Longbow.

- Repair to Max. Durability: Demihuman Longbow of Crimson Flame, Demihuman Longbow

item.name: Maple Plank
item.desc: A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.\n\n- How to Obtain: It can be also be obtained by Chopping Maple Timber.

item.name: Heidel Handcrafted Chair
item.desc: A handcrafted chair from Heidel.\n- 4 Set Effect: Interior Points +200
